extendedInfo.description: Lose It! helps you set a daily calorie budget, track your food and exercise, and stay motivated to make smarter choices and achieve your goal. We think itâs the best, most seamless weight loss system available.EFFECTIVELose It! is based on the proven principles of calorie tracking and peer support for healthy, sustainable weight loss.CONNECTEDWe seamlessly connect you to the people, devices, and food information you need to achieve your weight loss goals.PERSONALWe customize a weight loss plan that fits your life. Set your goals and achieve them on your terms.All the tools you need to achieve your weight loss goal, all in the palm of your hand.HOW IT WORKSGetting started with Lose It! is easy.  Simply download the app, tell us a little about yourself and your weight loss goal, and we'll create a custom weight loss plan for you.  Then simply start logging your food and exercise!TRACK YOURSELFLose It! offers a simple, easy-to-use tool for tracking what you eat and do. Our robust food database has thousands of restaurant, grocery store, and brand-name foods, all researched and validated by the Lose It! Team. Log food and activity on your Android device, or online at LoseIt.com.Tracking Features-Comprehensive validated food and exercise database-Easy to use calorie counter to stay within your daily budget-Barcode scanner makes tracking a snap!-Recipe builder-Share foods with friends-Meal & Exercise Planning helps you stay on track!**requires premium upgradeACHIEVE YOUR GOALSLose It! helps you set goals for weight loss, exercise, macronutrient intake,* blood pressure,* sleep,* and more! You set the goals, weâll help you with the plan to achieve them. Goals available in Lose It!:-Weight-Body Fat*-Hydration*-Sleep*-Steps*-Exercise (Calories, Minutes)*-NikeFuel*-Nutrients (Carbohydrates, Fats, Protein, Fiber, Sodium)*-Measurements (Neck, Hip, Waist, Bicep, Thigh, Chest)**requires premium upgradeCONNECT APPS & DEVICESLose It! makes tracking a snap. Our platform integrates with the most popular health and fitness devices and apps available (we're talking wireless scales, pedometers, workout apps, and more) to provide a truly seamless, connected experience.Apps & Devices Supported:-Fitbit Tracker (One, Zip, Flex, & Classic)*-Jawbone Up*-Withings Body Scale*-Fitbit Aria Body Scale*-Nike+ Running App*-RunKeeper*-MapMyFitness*-Facebook-Twitter-CarePass by Aetna*requires premium upgradeGET SUPPORTIn-person meetings are so last century. Access your support network from you fingertips through our social features. With Lose It!, you can connect to friends, family, and peers around the clock for the support you need, when you need it.Peer Support Features:-Connect with Friends-Control Privacy-Join Public Groups-Join Private or Hidden Groups*-Create Public, Private, or Hidden Groups**requires premium upgradeCHALLENGE YOURSELFWe think health & fitness is more fun when you do it with others. Lose It!âs challenge feature unlocks your competitive side and helps you achieve your goals. Whether itâs weight loss, exercise, or total wellness, Lose It! offers head-to-head, team, and group-based challenges. Compete with each other or work together towards a common goal. Join a public challenge or create your own!*Challenge Type:-Weight Loss-Exercise-Days Logged-Fruits and Vegetables-Total Wellness ChallengeJoin/Create Challenges:-Join Public-Join Private or Hidden*-Create Public, Private, or Hidden**requires premium upgradeBecome a fan of Lose It! on Facebook (http://www.facebook.com/loseit) or follow us on Twitter @loseit (http://www.twitter.com/loseit).

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This app is so easy to use - love that it has restaurants in the food list. Also love the scan barcode option. Makes entering yout food quick and easy.
reviews.author: Beth Farnam

reviews.title: Super easy App to loose weight!
reviews.comment: I love this app! Its so easy to use. You dont have to write what you ate. Just scan it! How easy is that? A highly recommend this.
reviews.author: Jessica Best

reviews.title: Loseit User
reviews.comment: I love this app. It is easy to use. The scanner feature works great and it is easy  to add foods that are not in the database. I would like to see more foods added to the database, a place to add the water I drink daily, and a place to add daily notes.
reviews.author: Virginia Hodge

reviews.title: Super app..
reviews.comment: Great and simple tool to help keep track of what you eat and your activities. A great eye opener.... And in the end, you will feel better if you use it!
reviews.author: Mark Skrodzki

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: This is a Great app to help you lose weight by counting calories and fat (etc.). But I gave it a 4 because when using the  search and scanner options it adds more fat and calories than what the product is. So it\'s best to creation your own. Other than that this is an awesome app!
reviews.author: Christyl Benford

reviews.title: Needs Metric Counting Option
reviews.comment: This is a great app but if your not in America than you probably aren\'t familiar with the imperial system. I would appreciate the option for grams, mL, etc.
reviews.author: Gaelan Kirby

reviews.comment: I\'m still learning this app but so far so good. I used this app entering food by calories and the also entered the same foods in a point system app. Found this app to be just as successful at controlling weight by counting calories as I did counting points.
reviews.author: Carolyn Carpenter

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Does whatbwe need pretty easily but do nt see a way to enter a recipe on my Galaxy S3.  Can do it easily on the \"other\" operating system (iPad).
reviews.author: John Smyder

reviews.title: search is all messed up
reviews.comment: Can no longer search without the app entering letters automatically.  I kept trying to enter pork and it would keep putting porn.  I finally spoke it in and it would not find it. I finally had to manually scroll to it.
reviews.author: David Morrison

reviews.title: Needs some more...
reviews.comment: This app needs more restrnt chains on here & the caloric intake. I was looking for shakeys & it wasn\'t on here? Seriously? It should at least give us the options of adding a restaurant or have more restrnt listings. Also creating food should have a list of sides that you add along with the calories that add up to the dish. that way I can add my chicken special that has chicken, rice, & macaroni salad that equals x amount of calories.
reviews.author: Zulema Oregel

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Love this app! I successfully lost 55 pounds and have been able to keep it off for almost 2 years now. Still logging my calories daily. One suggestion though, can you change the logging to meals (like meal 1, meal 2, etc.) instead of breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacks? I eat about six or seven meals a day and it would make it much easier to log. Please consider, thank you :)
reviews.author: Bernard Kocovic

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Would be 5 stars if they had Whole Foods brand. Thats where I grocery shop the most so have to enter it all manually.
reviews.author: Moriah Phillips

reviews.comment: I like the variety of workouts that I can input. I also downloaded Noon, but I was at a loss when they didn\'t have lots of water activities such as water aerobics or water polo, which \'Lose It!\' has
reviews.author: Christian Ocon

reviews.title: It\'s okay
reviews.comment: I think this app has an awesome layout and I prefer it over other apps like it but it definitely needs to include a wider variety if exercises and food. Myfitnesspal has a great selection of food and exercises to choose from..if this app were to do that then it\'d be the best calorie counter app out there.
reviews.author: Pauline Shepard

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Definately helps keep up with calories and helps lose weight. I lost 12 lbs using this app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs widgets
reviews.comment: Will give 5 stars if you make widgets to quickly add foods, weight, exercises,  etc.
reviews.author: Kirsten Rinear

reviews.title: Great just wished it had one more feature
reviews.comment: This app. Is amazing!! Very easy to use with barcode feature and the list of items already there. I would have given it 5stars if it had a way to record the time you ate your food.
reviews.author: Renee\' Moore

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I have been living healthier and happier ..lve the scanner makes it so much easier when logging foods ...I\'m down lots and lots of pounds ty can\'t wait to afford full version.
reviews.author: Kimberley Henderson

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Lost 18 lbs so far. Only diet I\'ve been able to stay on.
reviews.author: Lynette Thornton

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Very well structured and an endless list of food to pick from (first app of this kind for me though). Interested to see what the premium has extra.... Good job guys!
reviews.author: Cezar Nasui
